verbose_text: Depletion of Rab36 by RNA interference followed by an analysis of the intracellular localization of JIP4 in NGF stimulated PC12 cells showed a dramatic reduction in the perinuclear signals of JIP4 in Rab36-knockdown cells (XREF_FIG), indicating that Rab36 is required for the perinuclear recruitment of JIP4.
evidence: Rab36 by RNA interference followed by an analysis of the intracellular localization of JIP4 in NGF-stimulated PC12 cells showed a dramatic reduction in the perinuclear signals of JIP4
